thread.title: Teresa
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Teresa

author: Teresa
title: Teresa
text: Struggled to buy Hook & Gliders from any local stores so took to the internet and found Croydex Hook & Glider packs in The Shower Doctor store on eBay. Ordered and they were delivered within 48 hours. Service was exceptional, I was kept updated by email with the dispatch and able to track my purchase through to receipt. I'd definitely use again.
